channel.title: iDigital

item.title: In crowded voice AI market, OpenAI bets on instruction-following and expressive speech to win enterprise adoption
item.description: OpenAI's new speech model, gpt-realtime, hopes that its more naturalistic voices would make enterprises use more AI generated voices in applications.

item.title: Trump’s push for lower interest rates is on a collision course with government bonds
item.description: Bond investors are taking a “wait-and-see” approach to President Donald Trump’s attempt to fire Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook.

item.title: This under-the-radar storage stock is cashing in on Meta’s AI spending
item.description: Pure Storage’s stock cruises to a record after a flash-storage partnership with Meta helped the company crush earnings expectations.

item.title: Nvidia’s $46.7B Q2 proves the platform, but its next fight is ASIC economics on inference
item.description: Behind Nvidia's strong quarterlyu results are ASICs gaining ground in key Nvidia segments, challenging their growth in the quarters to come.

item.title: Forget data labeling: Tencent’s R-Zero shows how LLMs can train themselves
item.description: By using two co-evolving AI models, the R-Zero framework generates its own learning curriculum, moving beyond the need for labeled datasets.
